Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler

Class WolfScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfScheduler
  • public class WolfScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the necessary methods and constructors for creating and managing a schedule
    Author:
    Jaden Abrams

                                  java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime,
                                  java.lang.String eventDetails)

        meetingDays - when the event meets
        startTime - when the event starts
        endTime - when the event ends
        eventDetails - miscellaneous details about the event
        Returns:
